attributes.action: President Trump is wrong & bigoted when he blames a rise in UK crime on Muslims.
attributes.background:
On the 20th of October the President of the United States tweeted 

"Just out report: "United Kingdom crime rises 13% annually amid spread of Radical Islamic terror." Not good, we must keep America safe!" 

This statement is factually wrong, racist and needs to be challenged by the UK government

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
